title: Help
content: I'm trying to get a ticket for my non pesu friend, will I need to have a QR code or is the physical copy enough, also do they double check information or do they let you in after looking at your ticket?. Is it safe to get a ticket like this.

comments.body: Hey , I am non pesu student who has attended almost all pes fest from past 3 years , I think tickets counter is closed for non pesu students  ,just take someone's I'd card and tell that's him/her they won't really check that deeply and if there's too much crowd (like the one we had during ragu Dixit ) they won't even check if you have tickets

Thank you for the response, we have the ticket but I don't know if it'll work because it's registered under someone else's name, can my friend just use college ID of there college and get in with the ticket?
They are not that strict usually they won't check , if they ask you about it ,just tell please and they'll let you in , happened one  time with me during ec campus fest
Okay cool, thank you so much.
